ROSETTASCRIPTS:
This purpose of this "script" is to show off the aspects of RosettaScripts that are changing with the XSD update. Run the rewrite_rosetta_script.py script on this file with the following comamnd line: > python rewrite_rosetta_script.py --input example_script.xml --output rewritten_script.xml and then diff the two files: > diff example_script.xml rewritten_script.xml and you will see what kinds of things changed.
Here is a comment to make sure that we handle comments ok
